thought.text: Great! I've successfully updated the Google Sheets with 6 low-stock products. Now let me send email notifications to the purchasing manager for each low-stock product. Let me read the email template first and then send the emails:

data.subject: [Stock Alert] Nintendo Switch OLED Stock Below Safety Threshold
data.body:
Dear Purchasing Manager,

The system has detected that the following product's stock level is below the safety threshold. Please take immediate action:

## Product Information
- **Product Name**: Nintendo Switch OLED
- **SKU**: NINTENDO-SWITCH-OLED
- **Current Stock**: 2
- **Safety Threshold**: 12
- **Supplier**: Nintendo Distribution
- **Supplier Contact**: orders@nintendo-dist.com

## Action Required
Please review the stock levels and consider placing a purchase order to replenish inventory.

For detailed information and to update the purchase requisition list, please visit the Google Sheets link: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1JtHoy0oCgyCUvx9fBjBUzXWCOGwW_-RvNYKj1Hn2k3Y/edit

Best regards,
Stock Alert System
